name: macchiato poncho
notes:

❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️

the macchiato crochet poncho pattern is fun to work up in a bulky weight yarn. the macchiato sweater is worked from the top down in sizes baby to 3x. the puff stitch rows in the yoke add a soft wreath like detail. 
this is a great addition to a fall and winter wardrobe. the crochet pattern comes with a video tutorial in baby size.

check out the other macchiato patterns! 
 the macchiato sweater & hat crochet patterns also come with [video tutorials][2]. 

**pattern pack discounts**
use code save10 for 10% off two patterns,
save15 for 15% off 3 patterns,
save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns
cannot be combined with other offers.

**crochet hook:**
6.0 mm (j), [furls hook][3]

**notions:**
yarn needle
scissors

**yarn:**
brava bulky
shown in brindle for adult
shown in dove heather for baby
bulky weight yarn

**yardage:**
baby: 360 yds (329m) 3 balls
toddler: 600 yds (549m) 5 balls
child: 900 yds (823m) 7 balls
adult: 1,350 yds (1,234m) 10 balls
1x-3x: 1,550 yds (1,417m) 12 balls

alt –alternatively
blo -back loop only
ch -chain
flo -front loop only
hdc -half double crochet
inc. - increase
lp(s) -loop(s)
st(s) -stitch(es)

**gauge**:
13 sts by 8.5 rows = 4” square 
*see gauge notes in the pattern

**measurements/sizes:**
baby, toddler, child, adult, 1x-3x
schematic in the pattern. 

**skill level:**
easy/advanced beginner

this pattern was originally released in october of 2020, updated and re-released february of 2024
